radiographic_examinations.findings: Three well-circumscribed T2 hyperintense lesions in segment VIII, segment VI/VII, and segment VI, consistent with simple cysts or hamartomas. No concerning liver lesions. Portal vein and hepatic veins are patent. No biliary duct dilatation. Common bile duct measures 4 mm with a small retained stone in the distal CBD measuring 4 x 4 mm. The pancreas is normal in signal intensity and morphology.
